game.description: The ancient temple of the long-lost city of Zenith is said to contain a powerful artifact, hidden away for centuries. Many have attempted to retrieve it, but none have returned.
game.objective: Retrieve the Golden Chalice from the Temple of the Moon Goddess
game.reward: 100 gold coins and a magical amulet granting +10 intelligence

tasks.description: Speak with the village elder to gather information about the temple's location
tasks.objective: Gather information about the temple's location and entrance

tasks.description: Navigate through the treacherous jungle to reach the temple
tasks.objective: Reach the temple without triggering its deadly traps

tasks.description: Solve the ancient puzzles to unlock the chamber containing the Golden Chalice
tasks.location: Temple of the Moon Goddess, Chamber of the Chalice
tasks.objective: Unlock the chamber and retrieve the Golden Chalice

game.title: The Lost Temple of Zenith
